mapper.select: select * from student order by studentId asc
select * from student where studentId=#{studentId} and password=#{password}
select c.courseId,c.name,c.teacher from course c, sc, student s where s.studentId=#{studentId} and s.studentId=sc.studentId and sc.courseId = c.courseId
mapper.update: update student set password=#{password}, name=#{name}, major=#{major}, age=#{age}, remark=#{remark} where studentId=#{studentId}
